description: Students will learn basic techniqes to analyze, manage, visualize, and model data. Instruction will focus on the analysis of "real," salient datasets in a computer equipped classroom. In small groups students will discuss, analyze and solve case study based problems. Class sessions will include the Inquiry Based Learning technique; it engages students in frequent presentations of their solutions to the class. Students will use the R statistical software to perform statistical computing and data visualizations. Offered annually.
name: Statistical and Data Investigations
